title: Warren Buffett: Business titan and cover star
description: As the legendary investor prepares to step down, we looked back at his many appearances on Fortune’s cover.

title: Meta Chief AI Scientist Yann LeCun says the Big Tech giant won't be investing in his new startup
description: Meta Chief AI Scientist Yann LeCun is leaving Meta to launch his own AI startup. He said Meta would be a partner, but not an investor.

title: ‘Big Short’ investor Michael Burry revives his short bet against  Tesla, calling the stock ‘ridiculously overvalued’
description: Burry first shorted Tesla in 2021 but exited the trade months later.

title: Airwallex Faces China Backdoor Allegations from Prominent VC
description: Prominent investor Keith Rabois alleges the fintech unicorn's structure enables Chinese government access to sensitive US financial data.

title: Real estate investors using rental income to achieve financial independence make the case for charging below-market rents
description: It's a win-win, said one real estate investor: "They're getting a deal, and we're still making money from it all."

title: China’s Robotics Stocks Face Investor Scrutiny Over Bubble Fears
description: Investor hype over Chinese robotics stocks is giving way to deepening unease, with the latest government warning against a potential bubble bringing fresh scrutiny to the sector’s lofty valuations.

title: 'Big Short' investor Michael Burry reveals 4 stock picks, including Lululemon and Fannie Mae
description: Michael Burry of "The Big Short" said it's a "great time of year" to scoop up bargains, and shared four stocks he owns and likes.

title: Vale Boosts Investor Payouts on Strong Output, Iron Ore Prices
description: Brazilian iron ore heavyweight Vale SA will pay a special dividend to shareholders on the back of its strong operational performance and high prices of the steelmaking ingredient this year.

title: Li Auto Adds to Gloomy China EV Outlook With Revenue Miss
description: Li Auto Inc.’s fourth-quarter forecasts fell short of expectations, adding to investor concern about its ability to navigate China’s fiercely competitive electric vehicle market.

title: Napster Said It Raised $3B from an Investor. Now 'Investor' and 'Money' Are Gone
description: Forbes raised questions about a massive funding round metaverse-turned-AI firm Napster supposedly raised in January. The money is never coming, the company said Thursday.

title: The internet is loving 'Big Short' investor Michael Burry's crusade against Nvidia and the AI giants
description: Michael Burry of "The Big Short" is lighting up social media after betting against Nvidia and Palantir and casting doubt on the AI boom.

title: Ubisoft Shows Off Generative AI Game Demo Called Teammates
description:
During an investor presentation earlier today, Ubisoft showed off Teammates, a new R&D game experience that utilizes generative AI. Ubisoft CEO Yves Guillemot also described the advent of generative AI in games as "a revolution."
"Generative AI is as big a revolution for games as the shift to 3D," said Guillemot (via Game File). "We are making great strides in applying Gen AI to high-value use cases that bring tangible benefits to our players and teams... It's as big [of] a revolution for our industry as the shift to 3D.
